entry.title: RT Erik Knobl: Eden Protocol is an awesome project from @developer_dao! Please help us support this great team by donating to their Gitcoin Grant.
entry.summary: RT Erik Knobl Eden Protocol is an awesome project from @developer_dao! Please help us support this great team by donating to their Gitcoin Grant. eden: We, as Eden protocol, are proud to be a part of Gitcoin R15!🌱Check out our proposal and support us!💯Every dollar counts in Quadratic Funding🤪 @edenprotocolxyz TL;DR Consider donating❤️ https://youtu.be/LHqpZ1_fCtw https://gitcoin.co/grants/7285/eden-protocol
